import React, { Component } from 'react'; import MainTitle from '../components/pageTitle'; import Text from '../components/mainText'; import Button from '../components/button'; import Dropdown from '../components/dropdown'; import Input from '../components/input'; import Volume from '../components/volume'; import School from '../components/logo'; import Tile from '../components/Tile'; import Coin from '../components/coin'; import '../App.css'; class Main extends React.Component { render() { const time = [30, 45, 90]; const fieldSize = ['small', 'normal', 'large']; const yeild = ['Mongolian Steppe', 'European Average', 'Belorusian Magic']; const music = ['On', 'off']; return (
); } } export default Main;
